Class Client

All Implemented Interfaces:

public class Client
extends javax.swing.JFrame
implements jhave.event.NetworkListener, jhave.core.TransactionCodes

The main client GUI for the JHAVE Project.

Author:
Chris Gaffney

windowClosing

public void windowClosing(java.awt.event.WindowEvent event)
Method called when client is closed by conventional means. Won't allow the user to exit if they are taking a test. Also asks the user to confirm that they want to exit before actually exiting.

Parameters:
event - window event describing window conditions.
